name: Grover
description:
Grover follows the adventure of Robbie the boy (in the form of a raccoon) scout as he creates his own world in this puzzle platformer.

The goal is to passively progress through each level while strategically avoiding enemies and solving puzzles.

Key Features

  • Monochromatic glow-style pixel art
  • Hidden objects to discover in each level
  • Play as a passive character
  • Changing environment as you progress deeper into the forest
  • Superbly made music by Destery Smith
